The viewing angle issue doesn't exist in this model. The picture doesn't degrade at all when moving from side to side (amazing). I am really impressed with the black level and colors of that TV.  The styling is incredible. Samsung beats Sony in every way. Also the reflective screen on LN46A650, that I was afraid about, turned out to be a non issues for me. I am really happy with my new Samsung LN46A650 and don't regret returning Sony KDL-46Z4100/B at all.

Reviews.Title: Worked for 6 hours
Reviews.Author: Dr. Mac
Reviews.Content: I received the Sony kdl 46Z4100 and it worked great for 6 hours.  The next evening I tried to turn it on and it was as dead as a doornail - no power no lights what-so-ever. Other devices plugged into the same power strip worked fine.The Sony rep was no help. The in home service technician could not come for a week.  When he finally came, he wanted me to pay for the service call per instructions from the "Authorized Sony Serice Contractor."  The technician called the "Authorized Sony Service Contractor" but they were clueless.  I later called the Sony customer service rep and he was apologetic (talk is cheap)- but my tv still wasnt getting fixed. So I am shipping it free of charge back to the vendor, Vanns, who has been great.There are no Authorized Sony Repair Technicians in Montgomery Alabama (a city of 200,000) so one has to come out of Atlanta - 180 miles away.It may be worth your while to find out where and who are the Authorized Repair Technicians in your area before you buy a Sony.I enjoyed my six hours, but I can hardly recommend this experience to anyone.--------Here's part of Sony's response to this review"One of the challenges we face with our internet retail sales channels is attempting to provide excellent field service support to customers situated in areas where we do not have local ""brick and mortar" service facilities."Does this mean dont buy Sony online?

Reviews.Title: Great TV! But, turn off the light sensor when you get it
Reviews.Author: Boni
Reviews.Content: This is our 3rd Sony in 4 months and each one is great with a fantastic picture.We have two of the W series 40" and everyone loves the brillantpicture. So what a shock to turn on the 46" Z series and the picturewas almost terrible compared to the W series.We never had to turn off the light sensor on the other two and certainlywasn't expecting Sony had changed factory settings which explains whywe didn't look in the book and basically the settings are the same.This was the only downside of losing 2.5 hours looking at settings on the W and comparing to the Z, internet searching,trying lots of other things to get that brillant picture, even imagining having to return it...settings on all three TVs were the same and nothing changed.The W series has a light sensor, but wasn't turned on when we got it...who would have thought Sony has changed their default settings.Now we have a great, brillant picture. And maybe this information hasbeen stated before and I missed it before we got our TV, but I hope it saves someone hours of problems(s).Everyone is well pleased now.  And I'd like to add that Amazon wasgreat in the delivery.  Since this TV came with a stand to be moundedit wasn't able to be tested on the spot, but we understood that. SoA+ to Amazon for delivery and service.

Reviews.Title: First Rate!
Reviews.Author: D. R. Maxwell
Reviews.Content: Wonderful picture!  XBR4 is a bit sharper but not enough that taken as a whole this isn't the winner.  Plan on using external speakers.

Reviews.Title: Sony Bravia
Reviews.Author: Walter F. Martin III "Rusty Martin"
Reviews.Content: The online information was helpful.  The price was very competitive.  The order procedure was simple.  It was delivered in 5 days.  It works beautifully.  That's 5 out of 5.

Reviews.Title: Excellent clear picture, vibrant colors
Reviews.Author: Michele S. Roda
Reviews.Content: The Television:The settings are easy to use.  The picture is crystal clear.  HD channels are perfect.  Blu-Ray is expectacular.  Blacks are black and whites are blindingly white.  Vivid selection is on most of the time and easy to adjust to anyone's taste.  No bleeding colors or bands or any dead pixels.The Presidential Inaguration looked fabulous in HD.Local channels are annoying, there seems to be face movement within the faces and maybe the firmware will resolve that since it is the same on the 60hz tv as on the 120hz.  I'll update as soon as Sony sends them.The looks of the tv are very pleasing, we ordered the silver because the black one was not available at time of ordering.  The Silver frame surprised us by how great it looks and it does not shine like the black bezel on the other tv.  Also, by sheer coincidence, it just happens to match the brushed metal pulls of the furniture surrounding it, so it makes the room look very pulled together.Remote:Clunky and large.  However, I read in another review that this is a universal control.  I have not tried it all yet, but if that is the case, I'll gladly put up with clunky to get rid of 3 other remotes.The Stand:Stand on tv tilts forward and does not hold the tv upright.  Design flaw on Sony's part.  See Amazon forums regarding this if you experience the same problem.Customer Service:Amazon customer service rocks by taking over Sony's dissapointing and aggravating customer service.  For future reference, her name is Mary Ann and she contacted Sony for me as well and she resolved everything expectacularly well and I now don't have to worry about the tv falling over the kid's heads.  Thank you MaryAnn.Delivery:We got the same great delivery we got the last time, including the setup of the tv.  However, both times CEVA only sends one man to deliver and this time, the box opened while he was taking it out of the truck and the t.v. dropped to the ground.  2 days later, one of my neighbors wanted to know if there had been damage since she had seen it drop from the truck.The tv had no damage and it works fine.Bottom line:  We are happy with the tv and delighted with Amazon Customer service.

Reviews.Title: Super set, but delivery service misleading
Reviews.Author: lovebooks
Reviews.Content: This set is an excellent buy. Sharp, clear picture; slim design; easy to set up (w/included stand). We've had the set for almost a week and are so far very happy. However, don't be mislead by Amazon's advertised "White Glove" in-home delivery service. Although friendly and competent, the two deliverymen said they could not put the t.v. in the stand so essentially they brought the box in and disposed of the top (I asked them to leave the base so the screen wasn't left lying on the floor). Amazon's description is misleading. I was told most people are -- like me -- surprised by the (lack of) service. Amazon should change the description or offer partial refunds until it does.

Reviews.Title: Sony trend
Reviews.Author: dhobbs
Reviews.Content: First lets start witht he positives. Very good picture, makes even normal non HD tv programing look good.Now the bad. Expensive, Lots and lots of T-Con board problems. You can no longer find new replacement parts for this tv. Everything is used, so you take your chances on getting a bad board fixed. Sony will offer depending on the year you bought it, to see if it can be fixed or 15% off one of "their" tv's bought from "their" online store web site. I would stay away from buying a used model. Mine lasted about 3 years before board went bad. We just went bought a new LED tv, staying away from Sony's which we have had for many years. Shame quality is no longer the name of the game.

Reviews.Title: Still going strong 4 years later!
Reviews.Author: SB Mama
Reviews.Content: This Sony Bravia Z-Series HDTV was the perfect choice for our sunny, window-full living room. Great picture and no glare. Haven't had any problems at all in 4 years (knock on wood!).

Reviews.Title: Mesmerizing!
Reviews.Author: Anju Singh
Reviews.Content: I have owned this TV (KDL-46Z4100, silver) for 1.5 years and though I will not be able to give many technical details but for rest of the people in plain english, you cannot go wrong with this TV. Ours is hooked with our old zenith home theater system so we don't use TV audio but our surround system. In addition TV is also connected with sony blue-ray player (that we got in a combined deal while buying TV) and samsung dvd player (for international disc formats). Earlier we had cable TV with HD-DVR and our TV always looked superior to our friend's samsung class TV (don't know the model no. but its top line 52 inch thing) but we and our other friends thought its because they have dish network and no HD signals are coming but then they subscribed to HD signal and the difference was still there. And now from past one month we also have dish network and we have concluded that this is just better TV. And also the samsung dvd player that we have....our friends also have it and they have bose surround system that they use with TV and same dvd on different TV gives better result in ours.I still remember that setting the TV was not breeze but mainly because we were trying to get sound from our old zenith system and it did not have newer option available but rest was easy we just got HDMI cables to connect everything else. I like electronics but TVs were exception but after this TV....things have changed.

Reviews.Title: LCD Greatness
Reviews.Author: BearNecessities
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV February 2009, and it has since been shipped from S. Korea all the way to Portugal. been probably mishandled all the way around the world as well.The Picture is amazing, i have read some minor complaints about some "greying" on the sides, i have none of that. I love this Television.TV speakers are TV Speakers, what do you expect, better than nothing. i am not gentle with things i own, and turn it off and on repeatedly, or leave it on for extended amounts of time. i put TV's through what Automakers put their cars through in the desert... and this TV has lived up to the challenge i dont really know what else to say, superior quality and reliability, for me anyways

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Remy LeBeau
Reviews.Content: I'm not technical about TV... but I love this one!Got it last year and still love it! It is great for watching HD movies and playing games!

Reviews.Title: Trust Amazon.com for resale TV's
Reviews.Author: Bruce Henderson
Reviews.Content: With caution and some reservation, I purchased a "like new" Sony KDL-46Z4100 from Amazon.com Warehouse.  Not only was it actually "like new" as advertised, but six months have now passed and it is still priced higher at the discount stores than I paid through Amazon.com Warehouse.  I don't see myself ever buying electronics any other way.  They just depreciate way to fast to pay new retail prices, even when on sale.

Reviews.Title: Great LCD
Reviews.Author: JLEEW22
Reviews.Content: I originally bought the samsung 46" LN850 series, which was a great tv.  A week later my screen went out, so I returned it and got another one.  The same thing happend again after a couple days... I think they just had a bad batch of tvs.  So I ended up picking this sony lcd up.  I have had it for about 3 months now and am extemely pleased with the overall quality and picture.  The sound is great for an flatscreen, especially for apartment living settings where you cant really hook up a legit surround sound system.  Black levels are pretty good and the hd picture is great too.  What I really enjoy about this tv in comparison to the samsung lines, is that when Im watching tv stations not broadcasted in hd, the full television is still used, without having to change my screen settings to wide(or "zoom" to fill and strech out the picture).  I couldnt stand how samsung only used a portion of the screen with black bars filled in on each side... I know there are settings to aviod that, but it never seemed to look good. Overall I think the samsung 850 had a better picture when watchin blu-rays, but I am extremely happy with this tv and I think that my broken Samsung experiences might have been a blessing in disguise.

Reviews.Title: Good Purchase.
Reviews.Author: 5pyGirl
Reviews.Content: This was a great deal, and great quality. I had been shopping around for tvs for a while. A LOT cheaper than the exact same model that's at Best Buy. They delivered when they said they were going to. No hassles.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Patrick K. Greenwell "Greenman"
Reviews.Content: Setting this up was easy, and I bought a Sony HTIB and hooked it up, both work well together.  The TV's volume when the Home Theater is not on isn't as loud as it could be when watching HD channels.  This could be my Cable provider, other than than a near perfect system.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Michael Turi
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for about a month now. The setup was very simple. The sound quality is way better than I thought it would be. We're not big on filling the room up with speakers and with this TV ... there's no need to. The stereo sound quality is very good.The picture quality is stunning. I am totally mesmerized! Couldn't be happier. It's my third Sony and there's a reason why you pay a little bit more. They are the best, IMO.

Reviews.Title: 46" Sony Bravia 'Z' Series
Reviews.Author: Manuel T. Pineda "manny pineda"
Reviews.Content: It's only been almost a month since I got this product and so far, I haven't encountered any problem. It worked beautifully out of the box, no glare and the picture is crisp and near perfect though I haven't even done any adjustment yet (except turning off the light sensor as suggested by a lot of knowledgable reviewers). I mounted it on the wall so I couldn't tell whether or not there's any tilting problem. I am just hoping that I got the right (updated) base in case I decide to get it off the wall.

Reviews.Title: Good Purchase
Reviews.Author: Pavan K. Madini
Reviews.Content: I sure am glad that I found Bravia Z series! WIthout going up to an XBR, the Z series is the way to go. It has 1080 and 120Hz. If you look at the specs - most of the high end features offered by the XBR are already in the Z series, so it is a really good value when viewed that way. What a great looking TV (both the picture and the case). I have been extremely impressed with both the blacks on this LCD as well as the vivid colors it produces. The 120hz mode is also wonderful when watching football. I really cannot say enough good things about this TV - spend the extra money that the Sony brand demands, and you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: SONY LCD TV
Reviews.Author: tten05
Reviews.Content: Saw the actual product at a retail store, but by the time I decided to pick one up they were sold out. Found the same item here on Amazon for an even better price and bought it right away. Picture quality is awesome, sound is pretty good considering the size of the speakers but when you're watching a blu-ray movie you might want to consider buying a sound system since it does not do its justice. The connections to HDMI, component, ETC are offset to the left so that if you mount the TV to a wall or something, it is still easily accessible. Overall something you would expect from SONY.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Andrew J. Laubender
Reviews.Content: I was unsure about ordering such an important part of my life online but my husband insisted that we do it. We went to a bunch of stores and picked out the type we wanted and then came to Amazon to try and find it. We got it for at least $400 less than any store around and the shipping was free. When we checked out the shipping dates were going to fall exactly when he and I were going to be out of state visiting family. We contacted the seller(late at night) and in less than 14 hours we got a personal response letting us know that they would hold on to the TV until we were back in town. It came the morning after we got home. Very great customer service there. We were both very impressed with the TV and delivery and the entire process. Now we have to switch out our regular cable box for an HD one and we are good to go.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy
Reviews.Author: bsteve
Reviews.Content: A very enjoyable buying experience. No phone calls froma salesman trying to change the price or sell me warranty, extra, etc.  Simple and straight forward.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful
Reviews.Author: Fidget
Reviews.Content: Amazing picture, right out of the box.  I was prepared - went to all of the websites to dial things in just right.  Didn't need to do anything.  The delivery guy unpacked it and it was gorgeous. It's hard to watch our other TVs now.

Reviews.Title: Buying from the Warehouse side
Reviews.Author: Rivah Rhat "Gary"
Reviews.Content: Bought an open box item - Sony 46" z4100 series.  After delivery, found that the trim frame around the outside was broken.  Contacted Amazon and agreed to a rebate on the price.  Since then have found several other places that the trim around the screen and on the back that are broken.  I want to make clear that the TV is wonderful and that Amazon did nothing wrong.  The purpose of this posting is make you aware that you really have to look closely at any purchase but especially to open box items.  We love the TV and would buy it again.  If I had it to do over again, I would return the set for another of the same make and model.Gary

Reviews.Title: MUST HAVE!!!
Reviews.Author: mrshoosrddy
Reviews.Content: We recently purchased the Sony Bravia Z-Series KDL-46Z4100/B 46-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV, Black and absolutely LOVE it! It was shipped and received in a timely manner. My husband did a great deal of research before deciding on this television and we have NO regrets!!

Reviews.Title: Best price/performance and absolutely stunning picture!
Reviews.Author: Chilehead Photography "Captured Moments are t...
Reviews.Content: I started my hunt looking in the stores and was considering others like LG LCD, Sharp Aquos and even a Panasonic plasma, but the Sony just stood out as the clear picture winner.  I know that Samsung is the common competitor, but I know 4 people with Sammys and all 4 have died within the first year.  I don't like those odds.  I decided on Sony based on visual and then dove into the specs.  With 120 Hz motionflow, 1080p, High Contrast ratio and 10-bit, Deep and x.v. color (yes, the Sony site confirms this spec), the Z-series was a clear winner for price/performance.  I considered going with the 52v4100 and 60 Hz in a similar price range, but I opted for the better specs on the 46z to make sure it had the most "punch".  The 46z4100 was also actually less than the 46w4100 at the time I bought this so the W was out!I ordered from OneCall through Amazon with free shipping and it was delivered in 3 days!  The brushed metal "S" frame was discounted greater, so I got that and I actually prefer it over black.  I was initially concerned with glare, but it doesn't reflect at all and doesn't take anything away from the awesome picture.  I couldn't be happier with this TV.  Now is the time to buy as they are clearing this model out.  Thanks Amazon and OneCall!

Reviews.Title: Obsessive
Reviews.Author: Richard B. Tarriff "2muchresearch"
Reviews.Content: I researched obsessively for almost a year before purchasing this TV.  Once connected with the HDMI cables, this TV looks unbelievable.  Save yourself the time. This is the best TV at the best price on amazon!

Reviews.Title: Sony Bravia 46" Z-Series
Reviews.Author: REH "Rob Hunter"
Reviews.Content: The white glove delivery was excellent.  They gave an appointment time range and were here 15 min after the earliest time.  The HDTV works great and I was very pleased that this model has a USB port for viewing photos.  I have a USB card reader for SD memory cards which eleminates the need for the cable and tieing up the camera.  A minor complaint is that the Bravia series does not have a 'monitor output' like my 2001 Sony XBR had.  This was a handy feed to my DVD recorder.  Also the remote was easily set to operate other electronics but there are a couple of issues. It will change channels on my Scientific Atlanta digital cable box but will not turn it on/off. Also it does not seem to have an 'open tray' function for my Sony DVD recorder. Not sure if this is inherent in the design or a shortcoming in my ability to set it up correctly.  Overall an excellent value.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: B. R. Fitzgerald
Reviews.Content: So far the TV has been great.  It was a good choice based on the size range I was interested in.  I shopped around for the best price and Amazon had it.  Though Best Buy beat the price soon after I purchased.  The picture quality is superior to many others belonging to friends.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV
Reviews.Author: Tom
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV in mid Feb and it was delivered in about a week.  Deliver service was exactly as advertised (two person delivery, unboxing, and function check).  Coming from a standard TV, the initial picture was a lot better than imagined.  Initially, my Xbox360 was my only HD source (and looked incredible) until cable came to bring me HD.  I was plesently suprised at how big of a difference there was between HD and SD.The TV gorgeous.  The crossbar menu scheme is intuitive and easy to navigate.  I've had no issues configuring every detail of the TV.  The screen is everything I hoped it would be.  A nice bonus is that it isn't glossy so glare/reflections are not an issue.Final verdict is I'd recommend this TV to anyone.  And, with Amazon's low price and great service, this was a bargain compared to brick/mortar stores.

Reviews.Title: Sony Bravia Z Series-Awesome
Reviews.Author: S. Kosar
Reviews.Content: 100% Satisfied!  The order process was simple, right down to delivery to my home.  The TV is everything I hoped it would be and more.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: Matthew Dehn "FourKAbe"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV on "black friday" from my local best buy. There is several things i like about this TV.*Very nice design, Slim, very classy look to it.*120 Hz is a definite plus. Limits most of the jitter effects from fast moving objects.*Several custom settings for picture, audio, ect. I have one settings for when im watching sports, and another for movies.*Works really well with the Sony Bluray player, you really only need 1 remote when working with compatible Sony products. If you turn the bluray on the tv comes on as well, and vice versa.This TV is worth the money, i was looking at a Samsung 780 series. After reading several reviews about the screen glare i decided to go with this Sony, and iam glad i did. BUY this tv, you will love it.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Vanessa
Reviews.Content: We love our new television and we are impressed with Amazon.com and how they take care of their customers. We will definitely be shopping with them again! We are so happy with the whole experience.

Reviews.Title: Excellent set
Reviews.Author: Charles Rosenbaum "Tax Dr."
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Sony Bravia Z Series after a lot of comparison shopping.  My final two choices were the Samsung and Bravia, both 46" models.  We are thrilled with the quality of the picture and relative ease of use of the controls.  We mounted it above our fireplace and it looks and works great there.  My wife wanted only a 42" set for aesthetic reasons but gave in to my desire for the larger set.  She agrees we made the right choice.

Reviews.Title: New Sony Bravia LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Sony Fan
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with the Television set. The deliver process was as advertised. If I have any criticism its the sound system. The networks have a nasty habit of dramatically increasing the sound level during commericals. Thank heavens for the mute buttom.

Reviews.Title: I love my TV
Reviews.Author: Stephen Harper "Steve"
Reviews.Content: This Sony Bravia is the best purchase I've ever made. I love this TV so much. It's bright, clear, smooth, and easy to set up. It's wonderful. I HIGHLY recommend everyone buy this tv.

Reviews.Title: Sony Bravia Z
Reviews.Author: Devinder Kumar "david"
Reviews.Content: Good Product. Good company to deal with. Be sure to ask more question about delivering company and where are they going to deliver

Reviews.Title: It is a Sony and you expect the best and I got it.
Reviews.Author: L. Stemm "larry_ohio"
Reviews.Content: It is a Sony and you expect the best and I got it.  Remember you get what you pay for and it was worth it.

Reviews.Title: Not one regret
Reviews.Author: Nikki F.
Reviews.Content: Once I changed the aspect ratio on my dvr to accommodate the 1080, I am absolutely in love with this picture.  I know there have been reviews mentioning the black levels, but with all the different picture settings, you can set one up for a lighter picture and just switch it to that one when watching a show with a lot of night scenes.  I was a little hesitant in buying online, but that's why I buy Sony - I've never ever had to return a TV to the store, so I decided to make the jump.  The Amazon experience was fantastic.  I received a call within about 3 days to say it was ready to be delivered.  They guys that brought it in were very professional.  They set up the TV, walked through the basic operations with me and I've had no issues.  I would recommend the Amazon delivery process to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Very happy
Reviews.Author: GolferDude "Ralph"
Reviews.Content: "Analyzed till I was paralyzed".  We were going to buy the Sony for Christmas but my mate thought pricing would go down after Christmas; then maybe they would be cheaper just before Super Bowl (not!).Did not feel comfortable with such a big purchase online, but right after Super Bowl, it was time. Plus, using my Amex gave me certain guarnatees, and an extended warranty.Amazon:  5 stars1) Delivered on-time (when they say between 8am and noon, who shows up at 7:15am?)2)Before I could get out of bed and get my jeans on, the Sony was set-up, running and waiting for my acceptance!Sony:  4.5 stars1)  No gloss in our heavy windowed den (wished my laptop had it!)2)  Out-of-the-box INCREDIBLE picture3)  The 46" is "theater-like" in a 20/20 den4)  Speakers are great (at 65 yrs. old, how would I know if they were bad?)1/2)  We currently have a "pixel loss", and "quick movement" issue that may be Sony and/or DirectTV HD/DVR.P.S. "A happy wife is a happy life"

Reviews.Title: Great TV - Great Price
Reviews.Author: Tammy Haynes
Reviews.Content: My husband and I researched and shopped for our new TV for over a year.  We narrowed it down between a Sony and a Samsung.  After checking out both in stores and looking at picture quality, which is so close, it was down to sound.  Sony, hands down, was way beyond what Samsung was putting out.  Then came price.  We saved almost $400 by buying on Amazon!!  Plus, they shipped it for free.  The guy who delivered it came in, set it up, plugged it in to make sure everything was working, then took all the packaging away.  It was a great experience to a large purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: William Choppe
Reviews.Content: I am using this TV with a U-Verse connection and am loving it. The installation and setup took about five minutes. I am not very high tech so I haven't played with the various options on the back (and there are a lot). I would definately recommend this unit to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Eli N. Green
Reviews.Content: After months of research I decided this was the TV for me.What I can say is that the free 1080i HD content on TW Cable looks great, even SDTV looks amazing compared to our old CRT. I've never seen colors POP like on this set. I don't even want to fast-forward commercials anymore! They all look so good!I have a friend who works for Sony and he was able to get us a slight deal over the amazon price but not much. The amazon price is great! Don't trust the sites out there with $100 lower price tag. Read reviews for those sites and you'll know why.We have a tiny living room and the 46" screen is HUGE! More than enough connections for a normal user. I have HDMI from the cable box to the TV and then optical audio out to the sound system. No syncing issues at all.Now I just need a PS3 and I can finally enjoy full 1080p.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful picture quality and good value
Reviews.Author: J. Hooper "J. Hooper"
Reviews.Content: Sony Bravia Z-Series KDL-46Z4100/S 46-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV, SilverI am very pleased with this television. I am no expert when it comes to judging televisions but it is hard to imagine a better buy for the money. I looked at a number of products and in my opinion, Sony is the best. The picture quality is outstanding.I am also pleased with Amazon's ordering process and their delivery.The product was shipped on time, arrived without any damage, and wasset up and checked out by the delivery personnel.Would recommend this product to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: R. Rajbhandary
Reviews.Content: We got the tv the exact date Amazon said.We didn't have to worry about setting up the Tv because of the nice delivery man did that for us.Our tv is STILL up and running we got a super clear tv for a low price too!

Reviews.Title: Great TV & Value
Reviews.Author: S. Pagett
Reviews.Content: Saw the Z series TV at the Sony store directly beside the $5000 XBR8.  I could not see any differance in the picture, I know there are a couple of more bells and whistles on the XBR but the Z series at [...](Amazon)for me was a much better value.  The tech at the Sony store confessed that he had just bought the same Z series TV for his home and he felt the Z was the best value for the money.  Got the TV when promised but recomend that you intiate phone calls to the shipper to keep on top of it.  Their tracking web site suggested that they had contacted me about delivery and were waiting for me to schedule, but this had not occured.

Reviews.Title: State of the art
Reviews.Author: Samuel Chell
Reviews.Content: It would be less than ingenuous to claim this Sony's picture is empirically superior to a comparable Samsung's, but it's certainly as good.  In fact, at a screen size of less than 46" few if any observers will notice any difference between a 720p and a 1080p picture of either manufacturer's set.  But when you get close to the 50" size in flat-panel sets, the specs can make a discernible difference. The Sony Z-Series gives you not only a 1080p picture but a 120 hz refresh rate (not included in the S or Z-series) and 10-bit color processing (not included in the S, Z or W series).  Your eyes will confirm that the picture is unsurpassable, and if your memory is as long as mine, you'll have greater peace of mind with a Sony.  At present, the pricings are out of whack, with the Z series frequently coming in at a lower price point than the V and W series, making it an even more compelling purchase.  The onboard speakers are more than adequate.  I'm not impressed by cheap 5-6 speaker surround sound systems, but I did find that using the headphone "out" jack to connect my Tivoli stereo produced an even more vivid sound.

Reviews.Title: Delivers on every promise
Reviews.Author: C. Rea "PDPilot"
Reviews.Content: Having recently upgraded from an off-brand HDTV to the Sony Bravia Z-Series, I now see everything that I was missing. The picture is amazing, and the 120Hz MotionFlow technology works very well to eliminate the annoying artifacts from fast action scenes. The sound from the TV speakers is decent, but I also purchased a Sony Bravia home theater system and it was worth every penny. I am very pleased with my new home theater set-up and would highly recommend the Z-Series to anyone who wants XBR performance at a bargain price!

Reviews.Title: SEAMLESS EXPERIENCE
Reviews.Author: Henry J. Morris
Reviews.Content: From initial purchase procedure through installation, the purchase went well.The installers, Service- pro were particularly knowledgeable, helpful, and professional. After three weeks the sony TV 46 inch has exceeded our original expectations. At this juncture we are pleased with this purchase from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy!
Reviews.Author: Kim S
Reviews.Content: We ordered this tv from Amazon after returning a Samsung (also purchased from Amazon). This tv looks great and sounds great out of the box. We are not techie type people so we do not have it hooked to any additional sound and it is fine. We returned the Samsung because the sound was terrible, even with additional sound equipment. We are very happy with this tv. Amazon's delivery service was great!

Reviews.Title: A great Sony under the radar
Reviews.Author: Mr. Tuvalu
Reviews.Content: I was intent on purchasing a 40" Samsung HD LCD because the space I had for a flat screen was limited.  Then someone alerted me to the Sony Z series which I was told has the thinnest border around a screen of any LCD out there.  After much research, I went ahead and got one.  I couldn't be happier with my purchase.For most consumers Pioneers are at the top of the list of readily available high-end flat screen LCDs, then Sonys, then probably Samsungs.  I was concerned about cost because Sonys are typically at a higher price point than most available LCDs.  The Sony 46"  KDL-46Z4100 actually fits in the space of a 40" Samsung AND it's competitively priced (on Amazon, it's a steal).Picture quality and features (120hz, motion enhancement, PIP, range of wide-screen formats, etc.) are top-notch and with 4 HDMI inputs, I'll be able to use it for TV viewing, DVD, gaming and wi-fi internet access.  I wanted to get a silver one, but for some reason that version was a little more expensive than the black.  Still, I got a great TV for a great price with excellent HD quality.  With the thin border in the limited space I have (47" wide clear), the image simply looks huge.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous television and it was worth the reseach
Reviews.Author: Teachcat "teachcat"
Reviews.Content: Sony Bravia Z-Series KDL-46Z4100/B 46-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV, BlackThis television is one that I have done the research on for over five months. I was waiting for a good price. Best Buy would not go lower than 2,100.plus tax. I asked and told them about Amazon. The salesperson just told me that he couldn't help me. Amazon had the best deal on this wonderful television. Ceva delivered it for Amazon. I did contact them because for some reason they could not call me and the email from them did not reach me. They came on a Saturday morning.On Sunday, a friend and my husband placed in on our wall over the mantle. The picture is so clear. We got the Sony Blue Ray too so it is a plus. For 1568, I got a super deal and a realistic picture. I will write again if there is any problem but for now, we are enjoying it. Thanks Amazon for your service and delivery.

Reviews.Title: Great Set
Reviews.Author: David E. Goad "TMG"
Reviews.Content: Up and runnig for about 5 hours now.The set itself looks great. Small bezel makes it look as though you are watching a nice picture frame, with a tv in it. Set up was a snap, just hooked up the Sony stereo, the cable box, and the dvd player, and in less than 10 minutes the set was on and adjusted.This TV is fantastic. I can easily compare it to the Samsung, which I watched the Superbowl on 4 days ago. I can tell you the two do not compare at all. The Sony makes the Samsung look like an old tv. I am watching Lie to me right now in HD, and the picture just pops out of the screen. It actually takes some getting used to.I oredered it right here on Amazon, six days ago. Great job on delivery. I only give it 4 stars right now because it is still very, very new. I will update this review as time passes.

Reviews.Title: Sony TV's are the best
Reviews.Author: Plumber Scott
Reviews.Content: When it came time to upgrade from my Vizio 42" 720p LCD, (which has been a great TV), it was time to get back in the Sony fold. I have never had a bad Sony product, and after researching by reading customer reviews, all of my expectations have been met. The colors, and clarity are outstanding. I also purchased the Sony Blu-Ray player, so the remote that came with the TV is the only one I need to operate the Verizon STB, TV, and the DVD player. Thank you Sony for another fantastic product!

Reviews.Title: Sony HDTV Model KDL-46Z4100
Reviews.Author: James E. Ostrander
Reviews.Content: This TV has all the latest features and technology that most anyone would find useful.  The display is excellent and all features work great for me except the Internet Connection. I can not get it to synch with Verizon Fios and neither Sony or Verizon tech support has helped.

Reviews.Title: HD Heaven
Reviews.Author: David R
Reviews.Content: I selected this particular Sony model because it was the only 46-inch flat screen I could find that would fit width-wise into my built-in cabinet.  This is my first flat screen TV and my only regret is that I waited so long to order it!  I especially like the non-glare screen, as I have many windows in my viewing room.  The picture is even better than I expected.And kudos to Amazon.....I ordered it on a Sunday night, and it was here the following Friday morning.  The delivery guy had it in the house, installed the stand and plugged it in all within 20-minutes!

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Purchase Experience
Reviews.Author: L. Warf
Reviews.Content: I have purchased many items from Amazon over the years for lesser dollar amounts and the outlay for this purchase worried me at first. BUT, the timing and price just too good to pass up.  On top of the purchase price being the best I could find anywhere else (and I spent weeks comparing), the FREE Delivery and set up at my home was beyond any shopping experience that I ever encountered before.  The delivery man even unpacked and set the TV up for me. I love the TV. The colors are vibrant and so clear. I went back and forth on choosing this Sony or a Samsung Model.  I made the right choice and commend Amazon for offering so many choices and the many reviews that someone can read like I did BEFORE actually making the purchase.  Free Shipping means as much to me as excellent service and Amazon clearly rises to the occasion!

Reviews.Title: great HDTV
Reviews.Author: Henry Z. Tzeng "Sleepy H"
Reviews.Content: The TV was great, originally I didn't believe the hype about Z sereies Bravia, but it feels it's well put together.  It's sleek, It didn't have the gaudy glass panel like the XBR, or big wide.... really wide screen frame border like the w series.  The start-up instruction was clear, and only issue it took a while to register all the TV channels.  The I just follow the recommended HDTV set-up/optimization recommendation on CNET to optimize the image.  The control is relatively straight forward and easy to use(if you've a PS3, it's same media xbar).  The picture is clear and crisp.  Good contrast in both bright & low ambient surrounding light.  Low resolution inputs with compensation look pretty good too.  The only major "flaw" is component in, it had a hard time picking up the component input video signals, but S-video input from my old DVD(480i) looked really good.  Great value, great buy!As for the delivery service...The delivery was prompt, even though I bought during the black Friday mad rush.  They showed up at my door step at pre-arranged time.  They opened the box and placed on the pedestal, was done over with in a few.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Dennis Osgood
Reviews.Content: I shopped and shopped for a TV and finally decided on Sony because we liked the picture the best of all the brands. I purchased the LCD because of all I read about the highly reflective nature of plasma, and I have a rather bright room.The LCD definitely has a narrow 'sharp viewing' range. I can see color changes in faces when I move a couple of feet off center, but other than that, it is fine.I also wondered about buying it online, but I have had such good experience with Amazon and with Dell, I decided to save $300 and do it. It was a perfect experience. The TV arrived on time and in perfect condition. I also purchased my HDMI cables through Amazon for a fraction of the cost at WalMart.One thing to be aware of is that Sony especially, and maybe most of the wide screens, need calibration by a professional. The fellow I found was fully certified and spent over 4 hours making sure the TV and sound system were calibrated to optimal standards. It was worth the cost.

Reviews.Title: Could not be more happy
Reviews.Author: Nicholas A. Smith
Reviews.Content: This tv is amazing. Buying off of amazon is the only way that I could afford to buy a Sony TV and with their holiday deals I got one of the best tvs on the market. My friend has three different XBR models, all three are 46" and I cannot tell a difference between mine and the XBR. Having the built in tv guide is great and was also a big selling point. Another great aspect of this tv is its slim outer edge because there is no huge plastic edging taking away from the awesome picture quality. Amazons white glove delivery was great and i had no problems what so ever. If you want a tv, stick with Sony and buy it from Amazon!! I have had no problems with my set but I did buy the extended service plan directly from Sony for only $215 for three years of coverage which i would suggest just in case. I researched TVs for over four months and I knew all along I wanted a Sony but I looked at Samsungs as well but the picture quality of my set is unbeatable. Great TV and great price from Amazon!!

Reviews.Title: Great Picture and features
Reviews.Author: Outdoor Mom "D"
Reviews.Content: I love my new TV.  the picture is great and the firm  that Amazon hired to do free  white glove delivery was great! Delivery was on time and the set up took 15 minutes and he took away all of the packaging material before he left.  I haven't tried to play with any of the settings, it all looks good to me.  There are times when thre seems to be a "digitized" blur to some moving thngs, and I haven't figured out if that is something I can adjust or not.  I know the big box stores sell some kind of a service to adjust the settings, but I'm too cheap to pay for that!.  I was able to set up my Yamaha surround sound system without any problem and the sound is great.

Reviews.Title: Good TV, good delivery, easy setup
Reviews.Author: Roland Romeiser
Reviews.Content: Reviews of the picture quality and the features of this TV can be found elsewhere, and if you are interested in ordering the KDL-46Z4100 from Amazon, you probably know that this model doesn't represent the latest state of the art (no LED lighting, local dimming, etc.), but it offers a reasonable picture quality and a good-looking, slim body for a reasonable price, at least if ordered on the internet. I can tell you that my internet order from Amazon went very well - I got the TV delivered to my house within just a few days, the box and the TV arrived in very good shape, the setup was very easy, and I haven't had any problems so far. I think it was a good decision to order the TV from Amazon, which saved me several 100 dollars compared to the best price at local stores.

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied Customer
Reviews.Author: Ruth A. Bowman "Ruth A. Bowman"
Reviews.Content: Sony Bravia Z-Series KDL-46Z4100/B 46-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV, BlackGood Price, on time delivery and very carefully packaged and handled.Outstanding Picture (Sharp and Natural Color). Excellent sound and all the easily accessed features I could possibly use.  Watching this TV is so pleasurable that I am tempted to become a "Couch Potato."

Reviews.Title: Love it so far...
Reviews.Author: D
Reviews.Content: After much research and following the prices, I finally pulled the trigger on the Sony 46inch Z.The price around Black Friday time was outstanding and though I had planned to get the W, the price made the Z version the way to go.It's great looking and the few HD channels I receive right now are terrific.  I'm upgrading my cable soon so I can get all the HD Channels.Football games look amazing!  It's hard to watch the other "regular" tv's now.  I thought this would be too big for the room...but you get usedit pretty quickly and now anything else just looks silly.  Delivery was FAST and set up easy.I'll be looking to get more of these Sony flat screens for other rooms in the future and Amazon will be the place I look to first.

Reviews.Title: z4100 or a650?, we picked the z4100
Reviews.Author: Debbie
Reviews.Content: We spent 2 months evaluating the Samsung 46" a650 and the Sony 46" z4100 (and others along the way). We finally decided on the Sony and purchasing online through Amazon. We have only spent an hour or so with the new TV, but so far we are very impressed with it. There were a couple reasons we chose the Sony over the Samsung. One reason was consistent with all the reviews about glare on the Samsung. I noted the glare several times in different stores and happened to be able to observe the z4100 and a650 side by side at an hhgregg store. The two looked virtually the same except for one very noticeable difference. That difference was the glossy screen on the Samsung. I think the ideal tv would be one that produces images that cannot be discerned from real images. It was obvious on the Samsung that people looked too shiny and those same people looked more life like on the Sony. As a side note, the hhgregg we were at obviously did not have a looping video stream but instead had some movie playing on all the tvs on the wall. This movie was featuring two people rolling around in bed, which was causing one of the employees to be shouting for a channel change. It wasn't until the scene changed to full frontal nudity of a woman at the bedroom door that the channel actually got changed. Two full walls of tvs showing that was certainly interesting for a couple seconds. Back to topic, the other reason we chose the Sony was the cabinet. A Circuit City we were at had the a650 setup with a nice recliner about 10 feet away. When we sat in the recliner, the red touch of color border which also has a transparent rim was annoying. It seemed it would be distracting while watching tv, although one would probably get used to it. The z4100 has a much smaller frame, so small I thought it might seem cheap, but it doesn't in my opinion and does not detract from the image at all.One last thing... we were hesitant about buying a large tv online with regards to shipping (and waiting). However, as much as we looked, Amazon continuously had the lowest price and offered free shipping. The shipping worked out great. It came through a forwarder that was extremely helpful and I was able to pick the tv up from their facility 4 days after ordering and 3 days before the estimated delivery date. I was surprised when I saw their backroom and how many large tvs (ironically mostly Samsungs) that they had. I was told they would all be gone and delivered by the end of the day. There must have been 20 or more.

Reviews.Title: Sony Bravia Z-Series KDL-46Z4100/B
Reviews.Author: Glenn Roberts
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research before deciding on this TV. I have owned 2 Sony XBR CRT TVs and have always been happy with Sony products. Found this model to have XBR quality with a cleaner cabinet for less money. I couldn't be happier with this purchase. TV arrived earlier than expected and CEVA driver set it up and tested everything. Thank you Amazon, CEVA, and Sony.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: Donald Doolittle "Dooze"
Reviews.Content: I love my new Sony Z.  The picture is terrific and the sound is pretty good too.  There are a lot of bells and whistles on this TV set and it is taking me a while to learn what they all are.

Reviews.Title: Best 46'' LCD TV in the market for the price
Reviews.Author: S. Salapaka "Sagar"
Reviews.Content: I got the Sony KDL-46Z4100/B this morning from Circuit City with a free Sony blu-ray BDP-S350 player for under 1500 including taxes. Very good picture quality, pleasantly surprised with how good the sound is from the TV. Remote that comes with the TV is universal, I can control my cable box, av receiver, blu-ray player all-in-one remote.I find this TV to be of very high quality, I hope it can last like the Sony CRT TV I own.

Reviews.Title: This is a great TV
Reviews.Author: S. Branch

Reviews.Title: All-around great value
Reviews.Author: Tyler Leary
Reviews.Content: Have had the 46z for six weeks now. It's our first HDTV, and frankly it's been life-changing! Better finish up any projects or books you wanted to read before the TV arrives.The picture looks great in Standard picture mode, and you can toggle to Cinema mode for late-night movie watching with the touch of a button. I used the TV speakers for a month while getting our home theater installed, and I was impressed with the sound. It's still nothing like watching in surround with a booming subwoofer though, that's half the experience of watching movies!Also, for anyone on the sidelines over signing up for HD programming with your cable or satellite provider, it's a must. (Unless you just watch OTA antenna broadcasts.) Seriously, watching in HD is a totally different experience, and even my six-year-old notices when a channel is not high def. We have our 46z about 11 feet from the viewing position, and it's perfect for this distance. I was thrilled to be able to fit it in our entertainment center with the thin bezel. All the other HDTV models I was considering would have had to be 40" in order to fit.Oh, and if you're buying new components it really is worth considering making everything Sony for the Bravia Sync. I put a DVD in the player and voila, it turns on my TV and A/V receiver. Awesome! The remotes work interchangeably. Even when I use my Dish Network remote to adjust the volume the Bravia Sync knows which speakers I'm using (TV or external) and adjusts the right ones.

Reviews.Content: My Sony Bravia Z was purchased from Amazon at a fair price; I purchased it for approximately two hundred dollars less than any online retailer and four hundred dollars less than local retailers. I received my unit within less than a week after the online purchase from Amazon. It was love at first sight and immediately became the crown jewel of my entertainment center. The support I received from Sony in understanding how to manually change the colors and shades was excellent.I use my 46" inch Z as a computer monitor and TV. I have a Samsung 2500 Blu-ray Player and a Samsung HT-TZ515T/XAA Home Theater System. I purchased a Bello 60" - Flat Panel TV Stand in Deep Cherry and High Gloss Black. I recommend purchasing the Sony 46" Bravia Z-Series KDL-46Z4100/B to anyone who can afford quality electronics in today's economy. I spent four months checking everything for the best price fro my Z and Amazon delivered the best value. The KDL-46Z4100/B is colored black and the KDL-46Z4100/S is colored silver. The price of this unit has been reduced so do your homework and purchase a long term waranty. The difference between 120HZ versus 240HZ is negligible so buy the 120HZ unit and save yourself eight hundred dollars.

Reviews.Title: Screen Discoloration after 1.5 to 2 years
Reviews.Author: Anonymous
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV in December of 2008 with an extended warranty.  Late last year I noticed some discoloration on the screen when it was blank, in the form of a dirty brown smudge in the middle portion and two smaller smudges on each end of the screen.  During hockey games they were very visible and made the ice look dirty in those locations.  It got to the point that I began noticing it every time there was a light color on the screen.  I called the extended warranty company and just from my description of the problem, I was eventually offered either a replacement TV (Samsung LN46D630) or $949.99.  I've decided to take the $949.99 and eventually buy an upgraded TV.  I don't know if I will replace it with a SONY or not.  I'm starting not to trust SONY TVs.  So beware everyone who has this TV.  I have already seen the exact same complaint in the AVS forum from another KDL46Z4100 owner.  I also posted on that forum.

Reviews.Title: The Sony name has disapointed
Reviews.Author: R. Maggi
Reviews.Content: I used to think Sony was a name I could trust... as if they were the Honda of TV's. But I am rethinking that.First off, don't buy a TV through the mail. We bought ours directly from Sony. It arrived in good time. However after a few hours of watching it, the left half of the screen started to flicker. Soon after it got worse then it was nothing but colorful, vertical solid lines.After being passed around several times by Sony's customer service (none of whom speaks clear english), they finally told me to call a repair guy. I did, and took time off work to meet him. He told me that they needed to order a new 'panel' and that it will take one month for it to arrive. He also told me that the part may or may not fix the problem, and that the he will need my assistance installing it. At that point I said forget it, I am not taking off work again for something that may or may not work. Especially since this was a brand new TV, I expected a replacement TV. Again after over an hour of trying to get a hold of the right customer service rep, they told me I can return the TV, but Sony refused to ship out a replacement.Mind you, they do not package these TV's in a normal box, but a couple of layers of cardboard that needs to be binded (strapped) together. I did not have a binder or straps, so I used rolls of wire and duct tape from the garage.To make things worse, we got the sony credit card to get free interest. This was a mistake because it takes 30-90 days to process the return. So Sony has their TV back, but it is "in process" for a credit. We spoke with the sony credit card people and they said that we still have to make the payments if the return is not credited to our account. She said that once the return is credited then they will refund our money.As this is my first HD TV, I can only assume this process would be easier if I had bought from the store. You can return it to the store... right? Sure, you may save a few hundred dollars buying online... but trust me... don't take the risk. There is too much technology involved and there is a greater risk of something going wrong. I don't want to be disappointed with Sony, but I am.

Reviews.Title: Watch out for delivery bait and switch
Reviews.Author: Marathonman
Reviews.Content: The TV arrived yesterday and so far, it has been great.A key component to my decision to buy through Amazon was the white glove delivery for large TVs.  But, in my case, Amazon had my order filled by Vanns.  When I saw the Vanns reference while I was placing the order, I looked all over the Amazon site and did not find that ordering through another supplier meant another type of delivery or that I had any choice about who actually filled the order or what that would mean delivery-wise.  As it turns out, I did not get the white glove delivery.  Instead, I had to deal with FedEx Ground and their policies (no appointment--they will just tell you the day they are coming) and do all the other things that it looked like would be taken care of by the Amazon delivery company.  FedEx did bring the TV inside.  The Vanns customer service person told me that sometimes they ship by Yellow Freight.  I don't know how far Yellow Freight will take it from their truck (whether they leave it on the street and I have to take it the rest of the way?).
